thread.title: Clear-Coat Introduces the RapidCut Management Dashboard
thread.title_full: Clear-Coat Introduces the RapidCut Management Dashboard

author: admin
title: Clear-Coat Introduces the RapidCut Management Dashboard
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/8/2015 @ 6:16 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Clear-Coat 
PHILADELPHIA, Sept. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Clear-Coat , maker of RapidCut, the all-in-one solution for on-demand manufacturing of mobile screen protection and full body skins directly in retail stores, introduces a real-time Management Dashboard. The Management Dashboard is designed to give business owners instant access to all RapidCut activity, whether it's across single or multiple locations. 
"The Management Dashboard is the focal point of our RapidCut system," said Eric Griffin, co-founder of Clear-Coat. "More than half of our customers operate multiple locations, which can be extremely challenging to manage. By simply logging onto our secure online dashboard, you have all of your sales data at your fingertips, and can get back to focusing on growing your business." 
RapidCut Activity: Check which items are selling across all of your locations at any given point in time. Get instant insights on your sales or warranty claims, the number of items you sold, and the average sale amounts each day, all broken down by location. 
Daily Invoices: Easily track your costs with daily invoices, generated automatically for each location at the end of every day. With automatic payment status updates, you can see which invoices are paid, and which are unpaid. 
Reports: Compare your sales to last week, month, or year. All of your data can be exported as a CSV, for programs like Excel or QuickBooks, for a deeper analysis. 
Clear-Coat is in the forefront of on-demand manufacturing of mobile accessories in brick and mortar stores. By creating a custom-sized screen and full body protection for any device in a matter of seconds, RapidCut eliminates the need for inventory. Markets that utilize the RapidCut system include mobile repair shops, wireless stores, and Clear-Coat's global network of mall kiosks. For more information about RapidCut, visit www.rapidcut.us . 
About Clear-Coat LLC.: Clear-Coat, an Inc. 5000 company, is a manufacturer, innovator and consumer brand of mobile accessories based in Philadelphia, PA, USA. Clear-Coat products can be found through an international network of 90+ mall kiosks, distributors, repair shops, resellers, and Clear-Coat.com. Clear-Coat's flagship product is an ultra-clear protective film that wraps around the entire device without adding the bulk, featuring military grade scratch protection and self-healing technology, all backed by a lifetime guarantee. 
Clear-Coat LLC will be presenting at CTIA Super Mobility 2015. 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/clear-coat-introduces-the-rapidcut-management-dashboard-300138515.html 
SOURCE Clear-Coat
